short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An all in one tool for Amazon sellers to help them make better decisions and increase their profits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay ahead of the competition with our toolset. Easily spot the number of New/FBA Sellers and Buy Box competitors without opening extra tabs. Analyze product reviews for the last 30, 60, and 90 days, and discover the top positive and negative phrases used. Download ASINs your competitors are selling, including Product Name, Price, and Manufacturer, to find opportunities with brands and suppliers you already know.
